instructions:
In a 6 quart pot add water, chicken broth, soup base, bouillon, celery and peppercorns stuck in onion.
Bring to a boil and add chicken pieces. Reduce to simmer and skim off any foam. Cover pot and simmer for
50 minutes. Remove
and discard onion with peppercorns and celery. Add carrots and green pepper and continue simmering for 10
minutes. Remove chicken and vegetables to a platter. Remove from heat and add chicken gravy mix with
water. Prepare the flour water mixture and add to make gravy. Cook for 2 minutes. Return vegetables and
chicken and submerge in the gravy. Return to a simmer.

DUMPLINGS
1 cup Bisquick
3/8 cup milk
1/4 tsp salt

Before preparing dumplings, ladle off enough gravy so that chicken and vegetables provide a platform for
the dumplings as they are spooned into the pot. That is, the gravy level should not be above the chicken
pieces.
Mix dough well with a fork. Spoon the dough and float the dumplings onto the boiling gravy. Cook
uncovered over low to warm but bubbling heat for 10 minutes, then an additional 10 minutes covered.
Remove the dumplings, chicken and vegetables to a platter and serve with gravy. Serves 4. 
*(Rev. 2/11/96)*
ingredients: 1 small roasting chicken or fryer, cut up
1/2 cup flour mixed with 1/2 cup water
1 pkg McCormick’s chicken gravy mix with 2 tbsp water
name: Chicken And Dumplings
creator: Kate McCormick
